title: Translethal

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Transfer any killing actions between two players at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will redirect **any** killing abilities that targets one of your targets to the other target.
- Your ability does not produce a notification.

desc:
Post 779
*Have you ever wanted to project someone's suicidal tendencies onto someone else? No? Just me?*
